mapper.sql: t_archive_career_track.change_id, t_archive_career_track.archive_id, t_archive_career_track.before_user_category, t_archive_career_track.after_user_category, t_archive_career_track.before_business_unit_id, t_archive_career_track.after_business_unit_id, t_archive_career_track.before_org_id, t_archive_career_track.after_org_id, t_archive_career_track.before_post_id, t_archive_career_track.after_post_id, t_archive_career_track.before_position_id, t_archive_career_track.after_position_id, t_archive_career_track.change_type, t_archive_career_track.change_date, t_archive_career_track.change_reason, t_archive_career_track.operator_id, t_archive_career_track.create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_archive_career_track ( change_id, archive_id, before_user_category, after_user_category, before_business_unit_id, after_business_unit_id, before_org_id, after_org_id, before_post_id, after_post_id, before_position_id, after_position_id, change_type, change_date, change_reason, operator_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{change_id}, #{archive_id}, #{before_user_category}, #{after_user_category}, #{before_business_unit_id}, #{after_business_unit_id}, #{before_org_id}, #{after_org_id}, #{before_post_id}, #{after_post_id}, #{before_position_id}, #{after_position_id}, #{change_type}, #{change_date}, #{change_reason}, #{operator_id}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_archive_career_track SET archive_id = #{archive_id}, before_user_category = #{before_user_category}, after_user_category = #{after_user_category}, before_business_unit_id = #{before_business_unit_id}, after_business_unit_id = #{after_business_unit_id}, before_org_id = #{before_org_id}, after_org_id = #{after_org_id}, before_post_id = #{before_post_id}, after_post_id = #{after_post_id}, before_position_id = #{before_position_id}, after_position_id = #{after_position_id}, change_type = #{change_type}, change_date = #{change_date}, change_reason = #{change_reason}, operator_id = #{operator_id}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE change_id = #{change_id}
